thread.title: Barça offer Isco €20M to run down his contract
thread.title_full: Barça offer Isco €20M to run down his contract

title: Barça offer Isco €20M to run down his contract
text:
Barça offer Isco €20M to run down his contract Juan Flor Diario AS The Real Madrid midfielder will be a free agent in the summer of 2018, and according to Rac 1, Barcelona have hatched a plan to secure his services for five years. ACTUALIZADO: 22 March 2017 14:33h CET 
Barcelona have hatched a cunning plan to capture Real Madrid midfielder Isco, Catalan radio station Rac 1 has revealed. The proposed transfer would not take place this summer, but in 2018, when the Spain international’s contract runs out at the Bernabéu. €20 million for Isco to run down his contract 
According to Rac 1, Barça will pay Isco a ‘sweetener’ of €20 million on the understanding that the Andalusian will see out his contract at Real Madrid, before switching to Barcelona. The €20 million would be paid to Isco in installments, spread over the five years that Barça intend to tie him down for.
